entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
